item.title: Hands on: PlayStation VR review
item.description: The unit will start shipping in October 2016 for $399 / £349 / AUD$549 / €399, which is a bit more than we'd like honestly, but considerably less than its two rivals, Rift and Vive.

item.title: 2016 Honda Civic: autonomous features for $20K
item.description: When NHTSA announced yesterday that 20 manufacturers had agreed to include automatic emergency braking (AEB) systems as standard equipment on all new cars by 2022, many people noted that plenty of cars you can buy right now have this technology on board. You might think that in 2016, this is expensive equipment available only on luxury cars, but the Honda Civic sedan would beg to differ.

item.title: DOMINO'S USING A ROBOT TO DELIVER PIZZA IN AUSTRALIA
item.description: Domino's Pizza has unveiled what is being called the "world's first commercial autonomous delivery vehicle," which is delivering pizza to people in Australia.
